title: API Reference - Example Documentation
content:
API Reference

Complete API documentation for the Example Platform.

Core Classes

Platform

Main platform class for managing operations.

Methods

  • initialize(config=None) - Initialize the platform
  • run() - Start the platform
  • stop() - Stop the platform gracefully

Configuration

Configuration management class.

Methods

  • load(path) - Load configuration from file
  • save(path) - Save configuration to file
  • get(key) - Get configuration value
  • set(key, value) - Set configuration value

Examples

from example import Platform, Configuration

config = Configuration()
config.set('debug', True)

platform = Platform()
platform.initialize(config)
platform.run()
